routes.doc:
Creates new render

:param str folder_id: Folder ID to be assigned to the render
:param str template_id: Template ID to use for render
:param str html: Base64 encoded html string
:param str html_url: Url contains html file
:param Union[float, str] width: PDF output document width
:param Union[float, str] height: PDF output document height
:param str unit: Render size units: param Optional[str] name: Render name
:param Optional[str] description: Render description
:param Optional[dict] metadata: The metadata object with key-value paris set to the render
:param Optional[dict] merge_parameters: Key-value pairs for render to be injected into template
:param Optional[datetime] expire_at: Datetime render expiration
:param Optional[int] expire_after_n_viewsAmount of views allowed to mark render as expired
:return: Created render
:rtype: ResponseObject
:raises InkitClientException: if API request failed
